utterance.speaker: Originally aired
utterance.content: April 10, 2007

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Fran? I'm Robin.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: Please come in.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Cute home. Two bedroom, one bath?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Guy I know collects those. Says they're worth a fortune on the Internet.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: You've never used our agency before, have you?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: Is it that obvious?

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: As you can see, we offer a full range of services.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: Round the world?

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Our deluxe package. Offers all the services of A, B and C.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: How much?

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Thousand dollars. And satisfaction's guaranteed. Twice.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: I'll get the money.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: I'll get ready.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: Harrington?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: Harrington. What're you doing up there?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: All right, now don't take this personal, but you're gonna have to go...

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Fran?

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Is this okay?

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Fran?

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Fran? Are you all right?

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Oh God.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Fran?

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Yeah, I-I need an ambulance at 500 North Sycamore.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: I don't know. My... friend collapsed.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: And what were you doing when you fainted?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: We were just...

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: ... looking for her cat.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Have you banged your head recently?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Is this a motion-sickness patch?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: I must have forgotten to take it off. I just got back from a trip.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Oops. Scopolamine can cause dizziness and blurred vision. You probably hit your head when you fell and that caused the blackout.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: I thought those patches were supposed to prevent you from getting sick.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Every drug has a side-effect. But it might be a good idea to keep your eye on her for the next few hours. Make sure she's okay.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Oh, uh, actually... I...

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: She has to get back to work.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Is it important?

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: We just don't like people to be alone after they leave here?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: I'm fine. Really, I'm... I'm...

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Fran?

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Fran!

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: I got a seizure! Code cart!

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: What's wrong with her?

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: I have no idea.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Where's House?!

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Antique vintner's cane. Cost me nine hundred dollars.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: It had a corkscrew in it.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Ah! That explains the vintner's reference.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: It could be used as a weapon against the pilot.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Only if he's stuck in a bottle of Zinfandel.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: You'll get it back when we land.

utterance.speaker: NOISY GIRL
utterance.content: I want my blankie! I want my blankie! I want my blankie!

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Give her twenty milligrams of antihistamine. Could save her life. 'Cause he she doesn't shut up, I'll kill her.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Delivering goodwill to yet another continent.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: You only forced me to deliver a speech, not goodwill.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: You gave a three-minute speech. You know how much WHO accreditation means to the hospital.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Huh, may have been short, but it had girth!

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: And the room service thing was just spiteful.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I was hungry.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Three hundred dollars for a bottle of wine.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I was thirsty.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: A hundred and twenty dollars on video services.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I was lonely.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: That's five hundred in expenses I can't justify.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Don't worry, I'll take care of it.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Welcome aboard. Mr. House. You're right here in 2A.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Ms. Cuddy. You're in the next cabin and to the left. 9C.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: No, I booked two first-class tickets. This must be a mistake.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: No mistake. Just arranged for a five hundred dollar fare reduction. Expense problem solved.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Where did you travel?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: Duluth. To visit my sister.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Really? Is this her artwork?

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: "Fire... butt"?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: I was a little drunk.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Where were you a little drunk?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: I turned fifty-eight last March. Same age my mother was when she died. Next week I packed a bag and went to JFK. Looked at the big board, took the first plane that went to a warm place.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: Caracas.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Did you drink the water? Eat salads? Any raw foods?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: Yep.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: And...?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: I also did Mescal shooters and, uh, snorted cocaine from a homosexual man's stomach.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Did you have sex?

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: No. Not with him. I had sex with El Gordo. He was a large man.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: I never do things like that. I should have gone to visit my sister. It was stupid. It's why I'm sick, isn't it?

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Uhhh... it's... possible.

utterance.speaker: PENG
utterance.content: Uhhh, foof...

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Here you are. Rib-eye, medium rare.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Some more Pinot Grigio?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Uh, no. Think I will switch to the... Syrah!

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Sir, are you all right?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: He's drunk.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Nilalagnat ka ba?

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Does anyone speak Korean?

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Is anyone a doctor?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I'll go get her.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: What do you want?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Did you really think I was gonna leave you stuck back here for eighteen hours?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Go on, enjoy. With the Vicodin and the wine, I can sleep anywhere.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: We should put her back on the Scopolamine patch.

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: She can't wear motion-sickness patches for the rest of her life.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: No, but if it does relieve her symptoms, it'll narrow down our search.

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: Ugh! Anything else you two guys won't agree on?

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: Have a problem with us agreeing?

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: No, I have a problem with the other thing you guys are doing, which makes me question your motive for agreeing.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: I'll put her back on the patch. What else?

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: It's gotta be something neurological. We should do a CT. Look for a brain tumour.

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: It could also be an allergy or something environmental. We should check her home.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Bit more likely she got sick in Caracas than in New Jersey.

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: Right. I forgot, there are no toxins in the US.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: I think I'm starting to feel sorry for House. Get a tox screen, chem 20, STD panel, blood cultures. Then you run a CT. And you check her house.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Please.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Not funny.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Wasn't supposed to be funny-ha-ha.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Fever, headache, severe abdominal pain, and a rash all over his lower back. It's serious. May be contagious.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Wow! We just attended a symposium on pandemics and you've run right into one on the flight home. Talk about a small world.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: If it's meningococcus, half the passengers on this plane could get infected and die before we reach New York.

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: Is someone sick?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Someone has a hangover. He had a snoot-load of Bloody Marys before dinner.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Watch the movie.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: That booze did not give him the rash. It is textbook meningococcus.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: It is also textbook allergic reaction to... pollen... peanuts, semen-stained polyester blanket he's lying on.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Mr. Peng's throwing up again.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: We have to turn around.

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: What? Why do we have to turn a...?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: We don't! You misunderstood. Dr. Cuddy just meant that... he might feel less nauseous if he was facing a different direction. She didn't mean to panic a planeload of people.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: We're about to head over the North Pole. We don't turn back now, the next ER's fifteen hours away.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: He'll be fine. I'm a doctor too.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: You haven't examined him.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Korean male, mid-thirties, 5' 9", one-sixty, bald, scar on the right side of his jaw, medic alert bracelet on his left wrist indicating that he is allergic to, at least, penicillin.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Without any way to do an LP to rule out meningococcus, our only choice is to assume the worst.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Good point. On the other hand, I am a Board-certified specialist in infectious disease. She assigns parking spaces.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Please let me know if he gets any worse.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: Think we should feed the cat?

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Bowl's full. He wants it, he can get it. Cadmium Yellow? Heavy metal poisoning would explain the ataxia and the seizures.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: Not unless she was painting with her tongue.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Is Foreman right? Did you agree with me because of our relationship?

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: Relationship?

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: You know what I mean.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: You mean, because of our _lack_ of a relationship.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: I mean, because we're having sex.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: Yes, Foreman's right. I thought you were completely wrong about the medicine, but agreed with you anyway because I figured that then you'd do me in some old lady's home.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Then, well played.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: C'mon, we're supposed to be looking for toxins or something.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: We agreed it was a brain tumour.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: He's watching.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Haven't you had anybody watch before?

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: Is that guy really sick?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: No. He's all better.

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: I don't believe you.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Look that way.

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: 'Cause you're gonna throw up and I don't want it on me.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: I'll get some towels.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Give her a banana. Monkey see, monkey barf. You smell vomit...

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Okay, wasn't expecting that.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I need help!

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Who doesn't?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Need someone to talk to.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Can you say, "Croikey, myte"?

utterance.speaker: AIR CHASE
utterance.content: Crikey, mate.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Perfect. Now, no matter what I say, you'll agree with me, okay?

utterance.speaker: AIR CHASE
utterance.content: O-kay.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Nicely done.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: You... disagree with everything I say.

utterance.speaker: AIR FOREMAN
utterance.content: Sorry. Not understanding.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: That's close enough.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: And you... get morally outraged with everything I say.

utterance.speaker: AIR CAMERON
utterance.content: That's permanent marker, you know.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Wow, you guys are good. We are looking for the simplest way to explain these symptoms.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Organophosphate poisoning. Some international flights spray pesticides.

utterance.speaker: AIR CHASE
utterance.content: Uhh... could be.

utterance.speaker: AIR FOREMAN
utterance.content: Sorry, English not so nice.

utterance.speaker: AIR CAMERON
utterance.content: Is this a joke?

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Just passed the half-way mark. Can't turn around. Nice call.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: No worries. _We_ think it's pesticide poisoning.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: We don't spray these flights.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Dramamine overdose.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Wouldn't explain the fever.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Jet lag.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Wouldn't explain the abdominal pain.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Deep vein thrombosis.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Wouldn't explain the nausea.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Food poisoning. What was on the menu?

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Steak and sea bass in first class. Fettuccine and sea-food kebabs in economy.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Since when does food-poisoning cause rash?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Sea bass, seafood kebabs?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: He had the sea bass. Please tell me she had the kebabs.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: I think so.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Ciguatera poisoning. It's an instant onset toxin. Symptoms include "E", all of the above. 'S only found in certain kinds of tropical gamefish, such as...?

utterance.speaker: AIR CHASE
utterance.content: Sea bass?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Make sure you get a rèsumé from him.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Helloo?

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Excuse me...

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Ladies and gentlemen, I have a brief announcement concerning your meals. IF you ate the sea bass or the seafood kebabs, you have ingested a dangerous toxin.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: However, if you proceed to the restrooms both on your left or right or rear of the plane and vomit as soon as possible, the toxic effect should be minimal.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Thank you and have a pleasant flight.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Meningococcus makes just as much sense.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: What'd you find?

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Nothing in her house. Big waste of time.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: Medically.

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: CT was a complete waste. She was negative for tumours, her blood was negative for drugs, heavy metals, tropical diseases, food poisoning and STDs.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: Also no sign of lead poisoning or sepsis. Apparently, Venezuelan tattoo parlours have standards after all.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Good to know.

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: We sure she's even sick?

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Two more seizures in the last two hours.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Which is slower than she was having before we put the patch back on.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: I'm an idiot. She's exposed herself to so much crap, I just assumed it was a... zebra. It's breast cancer.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Since when is breast cancer treatable by motion sickness meds?

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: It's not. But the inflammation caused by the paraneoplastic syndrome caused by the cancer can be reduced by anticholinergics.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Hey, here you go.

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: Is he gonna die?

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: We're doing all we can. Don't know what's wrong with him yet.

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: Am I gonna die?

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Here, chew on these.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Good news is, all the pilots are red-meat men. Although I was kind of looking forward to landing this puppy myself.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Peng's getting worse.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Ow. That makes sense. First class ate before coach. He digested more of his food before he threw up.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Or you're wrong and we're gonna start seeing neurological symptoms soon. Seizures, paralysis, ataxia.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: We're not gonna see ataxia.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: You're so sure you're right.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: No, it's just hard to show clumsiness when you're lying moaning in the fetal position.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Hey! S... Stand up!

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Nobody speak Korean on this flight?

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: I assumed you did.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I know how to ask him if his sister's over eighteen. I don't think that's gonna help. Hey! Stand up! Stand... up!

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Don't play the cripple card with me.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Oh, hi. I'm leaving. Work.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Oh, okay.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Important client.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Um, listen...

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Are you close?

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: She needs a mammogram.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Oh, God.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: I know I'm throwing a lot at you. She just has no family in town. And I really think she could use a friend right now.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Okay, put your hand here.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: You don't have to stay.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: No, it's... no problem.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: But why? You don't even know me.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: You gotta be scared.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: I almost hope it's breast cancer.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: Then it wouldn't be my fault.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Whatever it is, it's not your fault.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: That's not true. You can control things. Not everything. But you don't have to take stupid risks. I was being an idiot.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: You were having fun.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: You have regrets?

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Robin.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Hold still.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Good.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Okay, we're gonna get just one more.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Sorry, I know it hurts.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: It's not that. It's my eye. My right eye, I... I can't see.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: It's definitely ataxia. It's definitely a rash.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: You wanna look at it for five more minutes before concluding it's also definitely a leg.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Thin leg. It's been in a cast.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: So it could be radiation poisoning.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: From a broken leg?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: From the X-rays they took of it.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: He could break every bone in his body and still not have enough x-rays to cause radiation sickness.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Unless those X-rays were performed in "Wankoff", North Korea by a third-grade dropout with a 50-year-old imager. Which accounts for the absence of fur. Radiation poisoning accounts for all the symptoms.

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: I have hair. I haven't had an X-ray since I got my teeth whitened.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: You're pregnant.

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: I'm what?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Explains the nausea, abdominal pains, fever. And why you're stuffing your 36Cs into a 34B bra.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: And her rash?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: PUPPPs. Common pregnancy rash.

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: I can't be pregnant.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: You a virgin?

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: No, but--

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: You're pregnant. Mazel tov. Let's get him into the chair.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Two different diagnoses. I thought you didn't believe in coincidences.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I believe in statistics. Two hundred passengers on the plane.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Ten should be gay, two should be with child, and one should be incredibly annoying with an extra ass chromosome.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: House.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Get him some iodized salt to protect his thyroid. I'm going back...

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: House!

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: You're wrong.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: I said we should've turned back. You should have listened to me. Now we're eight miles over the Arctic...

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I'm trying to listen to you now, so shut up. Heart's fine. Breasts are firm.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Is it contagious? A lot of the passengers are scared.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Tell them there's nothing to worry about.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Is there something to worry about?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Tell them there's nothing to worry about. Gimme a flash light.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Cover your left eye with this.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Mm... photophobia! Symptom of meningitis! We need antibiotics.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I'll call down to the pharmacy.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: You're creeping me out.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Then get me a lab. Pseudomonas smell yeasty. Staph smells musty. Some liver diseases smell of ammonia.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: House, I'm not in heat.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Citrusy on the nose, with a blush of toasted coconut.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Need to get a better look at your rash.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Use your imagination.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Fine, shall I go with "Lifeguard Cuddy" or "Mother Superior Cuddy"?

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Three more passengers are sick.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: If we don't get drugs, we're gonna have a lot of dead passengers.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Blindness in her right eye indicates it's not breast cancer. It's likely neurological...

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: I just met her today.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Huh... You should go.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: She needs someone here.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: That's not your job.

utterance.speaker: ROBIN
utterance.content: Please let me know that she's okay.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: It's just sex.

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: There's no such thing. Other eye.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Are you saying women can't separate the physical from the emotional?

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: No one does it well. Women do it worse.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: You just want us to stop, because you think it's affecting...

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: Me. Yeah.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Polyspikes over oh-one and oh-two.

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: That's her left eye. Burst suppression on every lead.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Fran?

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: She's comatose.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Nothing...

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Nothing... C'mon, nobody has no meds.

utterance.speaker: CLUELESS WIFE
utterance.content: Excuse me.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Open your mouth.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Where is the acyclovir?

utterance.speaker: CLUELESS WIFE
utterance.content: I'm not on any meds.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Well, you'd better get some. You've got herpes.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: What do you know? He's got some. This must be your lucky day.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: This is for real! People are sick! Some of us will be deplaning in body bags unless you cough up.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Thank you. Thank you. Thank you. God bless you.

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: Her brain is shutting down because of intercranial pressure.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Or her nerves are dying.

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: Because of the increased pressure. She has a bleed in her brain.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: You said the CT showed...

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: ... no tumors. But if she has an AVM leading to a cerebral haemorrhage, we coulda missed it. She needs a burr hole to relieve...

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: You wanna drill in her brain because of an invisible bleed the CT couldn't see? We should do an LP to confirm the presence of red blood cells.

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: And her brain herniates and then she dies.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Right, better to kill her in the OR. Chase, what do you think?

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: Here's a cliffhanger.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: I think it'd help to know what she has before we start digging into her brain.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Might be better to play it safe to start. Do an LP.

utterance.speaker: FOREMAN
utterance.content: Sex better be damn good.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Lotta apples, not many candy bars.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Any antibiotics?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Three caps of augmentin.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: There're six patients. Give 'em to Peng.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: He's allergic to penicillin.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: The first aid kit has two epi pens.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: If he has a severe reaction, ten epi pens won't save him. You take the pills.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: He's worse.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: He's a guy who doesn't speak English.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Give him the meds.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: If it's not meningitis, we're risking his life and flushing meds down the toilet.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Then do an LP on him. If it's clear, you win. If it's cloudy, he gets the augmentin and we risk a reaction.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Sounds like a plan. Oh, except for the part where we don't have an LP needle. Oh, and the shaking of the plane means I'll probably pierce his spinal cord and cripple him for life, but, I mean, it totally sounds like a plan.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: You're right. Let him die. Give me the meds.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: Got it.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Damn.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: What is it?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Shut up. Don't get hysterical.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Just tell me what the hell it is! House!

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: We should have turned back. We should have turned back!

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: House!

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Hold this.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Ladies and gentlemen, we have a passenger with a confirmed case of bacterial meningitis.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: And even if we land as soon as possible, the passenger will not survive. It's very likely that some of you have been infected as well.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: As soon as you start feeling symptoms, we need to isolate you in the first class cabin.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Fever, rash,...

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: ... nausea, and in the late stages...

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: ... tremor in the left hand.

utterance.speaker: FRIGHTENED PASSENGER 1
utterance.content: I have that!

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: Oh, god.

utterance.speaker: FRIGHTENED PASSENGER 2
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: What do we do?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Break out the bubbly. Yo! Listen up!

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Bad news is you have an illness. The good news is, it's not meningitis.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: It's not fatal. It's just embarrassing. It's conversion disorder. More commonly known as mass hysteria.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: It happens often in high anxiety situations, especially to women.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I know it sounds sexist, but science says you're weak and soft, what can I do?

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: House, you're wrong!

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: Look at my hand.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Yeah, look at her hand. Shaking left hand. What is that a symptom of? Not meningitis. It's basically a symptom of nothing. Put the idea into their heads and watched it happen. Same thing that Peng cruelly did with the puking and the rash.

utterance.speaker: JOY
utterance.content: The rash is in my head?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Your mind controls your body. It thinks you're sick, it makes you sick.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: If-if you'll all just calm down, your symptoms will soon go away. And to facilitate this process, your flight crew will move through the cabin with a complimentary bar service.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Thank you and, as always, have a pleasant flight.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Still feel like puking?

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: How did you know?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: LP was negative. I came up with an alternate theory and I tested it. Couldn't have done it without you. Rage is a symptom of mass hysteria. Just one more thing to clean up. Peng set off the mass hysteria. What set off Peng?

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: He really is dying.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Yeah. And I haven't the faintest idea why.

utterance.speaker: AIR CHASE
utterance.content: What's "extension pastoring"?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: It's when you're molested by a priest's cousin.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Do we really need these three?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Worried they'll make you look bad? Could be symptomatic of head trauma, cerebral infarction or intercranial hemorrhage. Thoughts?

utterance.speaker: AIR CAMERON
utterance.content: How long till we land?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Too long to wait. His head's as smooth as a baby's bottom. No bumps, so I think we can rule out head trauma. So you gotta choose between what's left. Clog or leak?

utterance.speaker: AIR FOREMAN
utterance.content: Errr... you're talking of toilet?

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: House, is this actually helpful?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Not so far.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: What about syphilis?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: First of all, he apparently speaks a language that no one else speaks. Which makes talking up the ladies a little rough.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: We're flying out of Singapore. If he has a credit card and a condom, he can get anything he wants.

utterance.speaker: AIR CAMERON
utterance.content: Eww.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Condoms. He has focal limb paralysis.

utterance.speaker: AIR CHASE
utterance.content: His legs got paralyzed by a condom?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: No, by cocaine. Was inside the condom, is now spreading through his digestive tract.

utterance.speaker: AIR CAMERON
utterance.content: Eww.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: You think he's a mule.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I think he's a jackass. We're gonna have to operate.

utterance.speaker: AIR CHASE
utterance.content: Cool.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: They're gonna kill her.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: We were wrong. Which means Foreman was right.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: Maybe Foreman's right about us too. Maybe we should just stop all this. I mean, if it's affecting our jobs.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: It's not affecting our jobs.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: We had sex in a patient's bedroom. A bedroom we were examining for toxins. Yeah, our judgment's right on the mark.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: All right, no more sex at patient's homes. No more sex with cats watching. Anywhere else you wanna cross off the list?

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: The bowl.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: Has she eaten since she's been here?

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: She's been sick since she's been here.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: What if it's a symptom?

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Why would you think...?

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: The bowl was full.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: You're gonna need to hold him down. He's not gonna like this.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: D'you really think he's a mule?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Fits the symptoms.

utterance.speaker: AIR CAMERON
utterance.content: You sure he's not contagious?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Pretty much.

utterance.speaker: AIR CAMERON
utterance.content: Can't be "pretty much" sure. Means you're not sure.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Oh, aren't you clever?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: C'mon.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Well, I know you're "pretty much" unconscious, but as it's been pointed out to me, "pretty much" doesn't mean squat.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Okay, hold him tight.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: The faster we do this, the less likely he is to die of shock.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Tighter.

utterance.speaker: AIR CHASE
utterance.content: Sorry.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Do that again. Ease off, then press down.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Pressure on his joints relieves his pain.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Okay...?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Wrong again. Where's his wallet?

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Scuba certification card.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Big deal.I have one of these.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Yeah. You also have a receipt from Tekong's Scuba Rental dated yesterday?

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Tell the captain to drop as low as he can under five thousand feet.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: We're at thirty eight thousand. We can't...

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Peng's got the bends.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Went diving yesterday. Like an idiot, he surfaced too quickly. Like a bigger idiot, he boarded a flight which is pressurized to 8,000 feet above sea level. Low pressure is killing him. Tell the pilot to dive until we can club baby seals out of the window.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: And get him some oxygen.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: Fifty years ago, it was one estate. The two homes shared an electrical system. Unfortunately, the exterminator didn't know that. So when they fumigated next door, the poison gas flowed through the old pipe and into your house.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: The scopolamine patch was masking the effects of the poison. You'll have to stay here for a few more days, but after that you should be fine.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: I'm sorry about your cat.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: And your hair.

utterance.speaker: FRAN
utterance.content: For twelve years, Harrington never left the property. I thought I was being punished for going away, but really... I was being punished for coming home.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: I saved your life. You owe me.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: I wasn't sick.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: But you didn't know that. You owe me.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: I know it now.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Your mind convinced your body to get a rash, photophobia and vomit. How d'you know it wouldn't have shut down your cold, cold heart next?

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: I don't owe you.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: You're mean.

utterance.speaker: CUDDY
utterance.content: That's how I compensate for being weak... soft.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: Just wanted to say thank you.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: You're extremely welcome.

utterance.speaker: KEO
utterance.content: I'm in New York every Monday.

utterance.speaker: HOUSE
utterance.content: Are you handicap-accessible?

utterance.speaker: CUE MUSIC
utterance.content: "Hope for the Hopeless" by Fine Frenzy.

utterance.speaker: WILSON
utterance.content: Hi, Robin? This is, um, uhh, Dr. Wilson, F-Fran's doctor. James. It was a toxin. We caught it on time and she's gonna be fine. Yeah, it is. Uh, listen, I was just wondering if you were coming back in again to visit.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Nice catch.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Think even House would be impressed.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: I don't know about that.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Any idea how you want to celebrate?

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: I want more.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: I thought you were getting a little worn out, but...

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: That's not what I meant.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: I know. I was just hoping you'd take the hint and pretend you never said that.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: I want this to be more than it is.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: I thought we were clear.

utterance.speaker: CHASE
utterance.content: In the beginning, but you can't tell me you don'...

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: Yes, I can. And I don't. It was... fun. That's it.

utterance.speaker: CAMERON
utterance.content: And now it's over.
